hero_section.heading: Become a financial advisor and start selling online
hero_section.sub_heading: Start Your Business with Zero Investment and Earn over ₹1,00,000 Every Month. Provide financial advice and products to the customers and get a fast payout every month.

first.heading: EMI Cards
first.sub_heading: Offer a variety of EMI cards from top banks, help your customer convert all their purchases into easy EMIs.

second.heading: Credits Cards
second.sub_heading: Make your customers pamper their lifestyle choices with the suitable credit cards. Offer a variety of credit cards from the top banks.

third.heading: Saving Account
third.sub_heading: Provide zero balance savings accounts to your customers and help them earn more on their savings.

advisor.heading: Who Can Become a BankSathi Advisor

card_1.heading: Loan Agents
card_1.detail: Well informed about all types of loans, use your knowledge and advise people on the best options.

card_2.heading: Insurance Advisors
card_2.detail: Use your strong network of professionals and personal people and start sourcing for all financial products.

card_3.heading: Ex Bankers
card_3.detail: You are someone who is up-to-date with the banking market trends, help people to finance their dreams

card_4.heading: Wealth Advisors
card_4.detail: You are a qualified professional who deals with the investment needs of affluent clients. Help people meet their financial goals.

card_5.heading: BFSI Professionals
card_5.detail: Working as a finance professional, use your skills and provide a range of such financial products or services.

step_1.heading: Become a BankSathi Advisor
step_1.detail: Register yourself and become a certified BankSathi advisor. Get training to understand financial products and services better.

step_2.heading: Share Leads and start Earning
step_2.detail: Upload your lead’s details in the app and sell financial products to them at most suitable rates.

step_3.heading: Invite More Customers
step_3.detail: Share social cards and other marketing content to create more leads.

step_4.heading: Refer and Earn More Income
step_4.detail: Refer the BankSathi app to your friends, create a team and earn upto 10% of their income.

card_1.heading: Zero Investment
card_1.detail: Invest nothing, start your own business on your finger tips.

card_2.heading: Timely Payout
card_2.detail: Get your payout credited in your account under minimum time.

card_3.heading: Earn Unlimited Money
card_3.detail: Earn an attractive amount of money on each financial product you sell.

card_4.heading: Earnings for lifetime
card_4.detail: There’s no retirement. Create customers once and earn on their transactions for a long run.

card_5.heading: Wide Range of Products
card_5.detail: Understand and sell an array of financial products to your customers.

card_6.heading: Training and Guidance
card_6.detail: Our dedicated training and sales team will provide assistance at every step to achieve your goals.

footer.first_col: Start Your Business with Zero Investment and Earn over ₹1,00,000 Every Month. Provide financial advice and products to the customers and get a fast payout every month.
footer.third_col: First Floor, Plot No 3/1, Attic Smart Square Complex, Above 3M Care Care & LBB, 100 Feet Rd, Binnamangala, Stage 1, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka - 560038, India

faq.que_1: What is the eligibility criteria to become a Banksathi Advisor?
faq.ans_1: Becoming a BankSathi advisor knows no limits. From a housewife to a student or from a retiree to someone already from a financial background, anyone who wishes to earn extra income without making any investment can become an Advisor.
faq.que_2: What documents do I need to register on Banksathi?
faq.ans_2: We need minimal documentation from your side and that includes : Aadhar Card | PAN Card | Cancelled Cheque | A Photograph
faq.que_3: How will I earn via Banksathi?
faq.ans_3: You will earn money in just a matter of lead conversion. Once you have sold the financial product to your customer, the payout will be credited to your account in the minimum time.
faq.que_4: Are there any Registration & Other Charges for joining Banksathi?
faq.ans_4: Absolutely not. Earning with BankSahi is free of any registration/ Hidden/ Annual charges.
faq.que_5: How will I receive my earnings?
faq.ans_5: The payout will be credited to your bank account.
faq.que_6: When can I start selling financial products?
faq.ans_6: All it takes is getting yourself registered before you start with your business. Once you are successfully registered as a BankSathi advisor, you can start selling financial products to the customers.
faq.que_7: What is the referral amount for BankSathi?
faq.ans_7: When your friends sign up on the BankSathi app using your referral code, you earn a referral amount of 10% of their earnings.
